snippet: The authorities say a woman lied when she told the police her daughter, 8, was killed when a gun accidentally discharged after falling off a table.
abstract: Georgia authorities charge Marsha Lynch with obstruction and her son Quincy Lynch with involuntary manslaughter and reckless conduct in fatal shooting of her 8-year-old daughter Sharia Lynch.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say a woman lied when she told the police her daughter, 8, was killed when a gun accidentally discharged after falling off a table.

headline.main: Georgia: Circumstances of Child’s Death Disputed
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Circumstances of Child’s Death Disputed
